content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Digital Platform Ecosystem\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In our work, we all must always ensure that the delivery is ‘green’ and ‘lean’, build the right products as well as build the products right.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In short, we follow the Lean principles where the main one is delivering value as defined by a customer, eliminating waste, and continuous improvement. It means maximum reuse and minimum waste (do not invent the wheel - use and build up ready solutions, services, PaaS instead of IaaS, etc.), making decisions based on data both for products and delivery (use metrics and available tools), response on users' feedback quickly and constantly.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Besides the proper mindset, understanding the business, and product vision, we are considering some of the services and solutions as required product components, and each of the products should use them. On the other hand, we all should clearly understand how to build the products right and consider the technical non-functional requirements described below.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Luckily, we are working within global ecosystems like EPAM BSS and Digital Platform, which have a lot of various working solutions, tools, and other products to accelerate, simplify and unify product building and maintenance. To operate and manage successfully you need to understand a set of them and be able to use them if it is applicable.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":177223,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/125ee33b-72b3-47d6-a238-a1c12e6bd908/Picture13.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/125ee33b-72b3-47d6-a238-a1c12e6bd908/Picture13.jpg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture13.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture13.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"125ee33b-72b3-47d6-a238-a1c12e6bd908\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1004,\"height\":726},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":4312941,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9d60c471-bf51-4ec0-a464-6575f6f53d2d/Picture31.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9d60c471-bf51-4ec0-a464-6575f6f53d2d/Picture31.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture31.png\",\"name\":\"Picture31.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9d60c471-bf51-4ec0-a464-6575f6f53d2d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":753.3515325670498},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unified products and services\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unified UI\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Digital Platform open-sourced UX/UI react-based accelerator used to build all EPAM internal products in one effective and consistent way. It is a set of reusable components and services.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There’s no need to build a user interface from scratch every time. Just use ‘Lego blocks’ to assemble new pages in a quick way for any current or new EPAM product.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Documentation: Navigation \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(e.g. Global Menu)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Global Menu is a list of EPAM internal applications (EPAM products) in one place. It is grouped by categories simplifying navigation through them. It includes the Global Menu widget embedded into EPAM products and its full-size version \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://menu.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"menu.epam.com\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Documentation: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHIVE/Unified+Navigation\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unified Navigation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Owners/Contacts: EPM-HIVE\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unified Help\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (e.g. Ask Support button)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unified Help is an embedded customizable widget that provides self-service for end-user. Product teams can integrate the Help widget and set up components they need (“Report a problem” – a mandatory component, “What's new”, “FAQ”, “Link to KB”).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Documentation: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHIVE/Unified+Help\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unified Help\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Owners/Contacts: EPM-HIVE\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unified Notification service\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unified Notification service is a platform that provides a single omnichannel notification service for Digital Platform applications and allows to send personalized messages to the users keeping them engaged even if they are not in the app right now. It works with such channels as email, MS Teams, Unified Navigation (Global Menu), and the EPAM Connect mobile app. All services may benefit from additional capabilities provided by UNS: email templating using MJML, routing of events, analytics, and reporting.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"line-height\":\"107%\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"color\":\"#242424\",\"background\":\"white\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Documentation: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMUNS/EPAM+Unified+Notification+Service+Home\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unified Notification service\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - Api is a .NET Package (hosted at Epam Ecosystem Nuget Server) that contains EPAM-adopted \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"line-height\":\"107%\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"color\":\"#242424\",\"background\":\"white\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://Confluent.Kafka.NET\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Confluent.Kafka.NET\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"line-height\":\"107%\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"color\":\"#242424\",\"background\":\"white\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" driver, pre-generated DTOs for common entities (CDM, PMIS, various other Apps' topics), and shortcuts to discover Kafka topics. It helps to use EPAM infrastructure in a convenient way, not bothering with low-level details, and with the minimum configuration EF\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://git.epam.com/epm-ppa/epam-api-core\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM.Api.EF \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM. Api.EF is a .NET Package which abstracts Kafka-related jobs for Pub/Sub, and takes care of tasks scheduling, batching, logging, and monitoring Kafka integrations. It is designed for replication data from database tables to Kafka topics and in a reverse way using Entity Framework to access DB and Epam.Api package to access Kafka. With this package, you can configure the way data from your DB tables will be produced to Kafka and the way the consumed data from Kafka topics will be saved into your DB.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Documentation: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMECOSYS/.Net+-+Epam.Api.EF\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".Net - Epam.Api.EF\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Git: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://git.epam.com/epm-ppa/epam-api-core\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://git.epam.com/epm-ppa/epam-api-core\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - current version, EF 6.*, Core 2.*, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://git.epam.com/epm-ppa/epam-api-replication\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://git.epam.com/epm-ppa/epam-api-replication\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – new version, EF Core 3.1\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM.Auth \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM.Auth is a .Net Package that enables easy integration with EPAM SSO, Keycloak. It simplifies configuration and provides additional services.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Git: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://git.epam.com/epm-tmc/epam-auth\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://git.epam.com/epm-tmc/epam-auth\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM.GraphQL\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM.GraphQL is an open-sourced set of .NET libraries that provides a high-level way for building GraphQL APIs with a few lines of code, including but not limited to CRUD, batching, complex sorting and filtering, and pagination. It is built on top of cloud.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"No servers and VMs.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These rules are not mandatory but recommended ones. The following services that could be used:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Run-time\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM CloudApp (ex EPAM PaaS) \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM CloudApp is a cloud run-time environment for applications as containers on scalable resources with minimal configuration management overhead. The platform provides development, management, security, and integration capabilities also referred to as ‘Shared Infrastructure’ services. They are delivered as a self-service over EPAM cloud.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Documentation: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://cloudapp.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://cloudapp.epam.com/\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Cloud \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM CloudApp is a global platform that can transform the way you develop, test, deploy, and host the applications and services, on which your business and your clients depend. EPAM Cloud is a part of the EPAM ecosystem integrated with other EPAM services, such as UPSA, SSO, Active Directory, and others, which allows users to get necessary computing capacities quickly and under high-security conditions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Documentation: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://cloud.epam.com/site/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://cloud.epam.com/site/\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Data Hub \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Data Hub is a transport layer of enterprise data. Data Hub does not generate business data itself. Instead, it receives incoming data streams from EPAM internal systems (data sources), stores these data, and makes them available to EPAM data consumers. It offers a flexible and open ecosystem of data services (Pub-Sub, Data Lake, Materializer, etc.) for the EPAM internal teams, which simplify the design, integration, and operation of enterprise apps as well as reduces the time-to-market of new capabilities and costs.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Documentation: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMEAGBSS/DataHub+Overview\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DataHub Overview\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Data Lake \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The multi-temporal Data Lake serves as an eternal accumulator of all internal EPAM data. It provides standard SQL query functionality, allowing to run powerful analytics directly on all EPAM archive data at once.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Documentation: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMECOSYS/Data+Lake+Service\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Lake Service\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMECOSYS/Data+Lake+Service\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM CDM (Corporate Data Model) \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Corporate Data Model offers an extra level of abstraction between different data formats and applications (modules), a transport layer of enterprise data such as employees, projects, locations, and so on. It defines a unified data interface, integration approach, and a data model. To simplify, this is a data schema and data itself. For consumers, it looks like a set of entities, taxonomies, and aggregated sets that represents the EPAM business schema.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Documentation: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=1135328771\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=1135328771\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CDM: corporate data model\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Corporate Data Model (CDM)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PMIS (People Management Integration Service)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On Hold (Support)\\n\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PMIS is a data interface, an integration approach, and a data model for People Technology apps. To simplify, that is data schema and data itself. It is going to be replaced by EPAM API/CDM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Owners/Contacts: EPM-PPA\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM API\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM.API is several APIs on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://api.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"api.epam.com\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". These APIs were intended to cover the Anywhere requirements, but it is available to any product in the EPAM Digital Platform ecosystem. It is running on a very modern AWS native architecture that allows to build very fast, very reliable, and highly available APIs.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Documentation: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMDDO/api.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMDDO/api.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM CDN\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM CDN is a globally distributed network of proxy servers deployed in multiple data centers. The goal of CDN is to serve content to end-users with high availability and high performance.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Documentation: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCDN/EPAM+CDN\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCDN/EPAM+CDN\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
